welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nieuw-Vennep, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historical sites, and warm atmosphere. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take some time to discover all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily used for European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, mainly used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
